item.title: The Fed Just Unlocked This Unloved Corner of the Stock Market
item.description: Small-cap stocks could finally outperform Big Tech with a rate cut.

item.title: Why the Government’s Owning a Piece of Intel Will Harm Businesses
item.description: This deal is bad for Intel’s competitors, bad for the economy, and may not even be great for Intel itself.

item.title: Why These Tesla Alumni Are Building an AI-Powered ‘Minority Report for Cars’
item.description: Predictive Horizons has a big idea, and it involves preventing automotive problems before they even happen.

item.title: 4 Reasons You Need to Right-Size Your AI
item.description: Sometimes it’s smart to be careful—and slow—when you’re dealing with new technologies.

item.title: Harvard Research Says Living a Satisfying Life Full of Joy Boils Down to These Strategies
item.description: Joy is the secret ingredient to a fulfilling life—and it’s what most busy professionals overlook.
